What is ?

is a typesetting system used in many technical academic fields. The system takes your input and formats it to display equations, graphics and document layouts.

With the{" "} amsmath {" "} package, allows users to type up mathematics for a professional presentation.

How do I use it ?

This website offers a basic TeX compiler to help you get started learning basic mathematical formatting. To work in a full document environment, try {" "}Overleaf.com, a TeX editor.
